details.title: Numerical simulation of rotor-stator interactions in a transonic compressor stage
details.abstract: A numerical method is developed for the simulation of rotor stator interactions in a compessor or turbine stage. This method solves quasi three dimensional Navier Stokes equations by an implicit high resolution finite volume approach. A fully conservative method is designed to compute the inviscid and viscous fluxes at the interface of rotor and stator grids. Numerical results of rotor stator interactions in a transonic compressor stage are presented. The mechanism of rotor stator interactions in this compressor stage is discussed in terms of the computational results.
